label: Bug-1
title: Add link to open API docs in UI
description:
The UI should have a convenient link to open the FastAPI documentation page.

Currently users have to manually navigate to `/docs` to access the API documentation. This should be accessible from within the workbench UI.

## Expected Behavior
- Add a visible link/button to open the docs
- Should open at `http://localhost:10041/docs`

## Suggested Implementation
- Add a docs link in the header or dev section
- Could be added to the API Explorer component or as a separate nav item
